channel.title: [Source] Xp/Hour [Vb 6.0]
channel.description:
[code]Private Sub cp_Click() Dim ipt As String Dim ips As String ipt = InputBox("Creatures Hp?") ips = InputBox("Ur kills per minute?") label1 = ipt * ips * 4 * 60 MsgBox "U get " & label1.caption & " Xp/Hour" End Sub [/code]
Add an command button called Cp and a label called label1. Then you're finished. It will ask the player what is the creatures hp and the kills per minute. Finito, you just made an calculating for getting the xp in 1 hour :eek:. Got any questions :confused: ask it.

item.title: [Source] Xp/Hour [Vb 6.0]

item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Heh, you bump a 2 months old post to say that? -.-

Read full topic

item.title: [Source] Xp/Hour [Vb 6.0]
item.dc:creator: @Keinieboy007 Keinieboy007
item.description:
@Keinieboy007 wrote:

[quote=“Freddy1990, post:4, topic:566”]BTW: Label1 has to be Label1.Caption or it won’t display anything.

If you’d wan’t to add it to a module, to calculate you could change it like this:

Function XP_Hour(CreatureHP As Long, KillAM As Long) As Long XP_Hour = CreatureHP * KillAM * 4 * 60 End Function

That would be easier to use in programs.

In this case:

Private Sub cp_Click() Dim ipt As String, ips As String ipt = InputBox("Creatures Hp?") ips = InputBox("Ur kills per minute?") Label1.Caption = Str(XP_Hour(Val(ipt), Val(ips)) MsgBox "U get " & Label1.Caption & " Xp/Hour" End Sub

That might help… :rolleyes:[/quote]

lol freddy1990 has spoken :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: [Source] Xp/Hour [Vb 6.0]
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

BTW: Label1 has to be Label1.Caption or it won't display anything.

If you'd wan't to add it to a module, to calculate you could change it like this:

Function XP_Hour(CreatureHP As Long, KillAM As Long) As Long
    XP_Hour = CreatureHP * KillAM * 4 * 60
End Function

That would be easier to use in programs.

In this case:

Private Sub cp_Click()
Dim ipt As String, ips As String
    ipt = InputBox("Creatures Hp?")
    ips = InputBox("Ur kills per minute?")
    Label1.Caption = Str(XP_Hour(Val(ipt), Val(ips))
    MsgBox "U get " &  Label1.Caption & " Xp/Hour"
End Sub

That might help... :rolleyes:

Read full topic

label1 = ipt * ips * 4 * 60
MsgBox "U get " &  label1 & " Xp/Hour"
End Sub

Add an command button called Cp and a label called label1. Then ur finished. It will ask the player what is the creatures hp and the kills per minute. Finito, u just made an calculating for getting the xp in 1 hour :eek:. Got any questions ask it.[/quote]

Add an command button called Cp and a label called label1. Then you're finished. It will ask the player what is the creatures hp and the kills per minute. Finito, you just made an calculating for getting the xp in 1 hour :eek:. Got any questions ask it.
